title: Game crashed and no way to reconnect
body:
I was just disconnected from a game, and then the game closed, but instead of telling me to reconnect, I was put into champ select.

I just checked my OP.GG too. Apparently I'm still in the game that crashed, but I have no way to reconnect.

Please fix this bug.

replies.body:
I just had this too, maybe we were in the same game?
The game doesnt even exist on op.gg or match history
